title: Crock Pot Pork Ribs with Zesty Barbeque Sauce
directions: Spray crock pot with non-stick cooking spray
Mix together chili sauce, garlic, peppers, coriander, chili powder, mustard, corn syrup, sugar, and vinegar.
Pour mixture over meat and set to low for 6-8 hours
Before serving take out some of the sauce and boil on stove. Mix the corn starch with the water and pour in slowly while constantly stirring to make a rich BBQ gravy
ingredients: 2 Tbsp hot mustard (I used a spicy brown)
1/4 C vinegar (I used white wine but apple cider would be great in this)
1/4 - 1/2 C brown sugar depending on your tastes
